title: Check Product Availability in Regions
description: Goose researches which countries and regions a product is available in.
prompt:
List ISO 3166-1 country codes where {product_name} is sold. Return JSON containing:
country_codes: List of the ISO-3166-1 country codes that are valid for this device
device_model: The model you have performed the lookup for
is_north_america: Whether or not the specified device is expected to acquired easily in north america
example:
List ISO 3166-1 country codes where Symphony Innova30 is sold. Return JSON containing:
country_codes: List of the ISO-3166-1 country codes that are valid for this device
device_model: The model you have performed the lookup for
is_north_america: Whether or not the specified device is expected to acquired easily in north america
author: GooseAI Team

variables.name: product_name
variables.description: The name/model of the product to look up regional availability for
